title: I am thinking of buying a lot in Compass Pointe, the private gated community being developed by Bert Exum and Bobby Harrelson. What is the financial status of the developers and does it seem like a good, safe investment. Many ammenities are not yet built, is there a money problem ? Thank you,Tom
